```js
    $('a[rel="ireland"]').colorbox({
    transition: 'none',
    width: '90%',
    height: '60%',
    slideshow: true,
    slideshowSpeed: 2000,
    slideshowAuto: false,
    slideshowStart: 'Let\'s get started!',
    slideshowStop: 'Ok, that\'s enough.'

    ```
